sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_2d342c68db9023007a74fe1b689619a2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Change Account">d401be25db1f13003d1dd001cf9619a2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e801f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961935</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Effective Date</name><order>400</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Effective Date not to set in Past
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-645 11-July-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
		
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == oldValue) {
		return;
	}

	// This assign to the local value seems to be necessary
	var effective_date = newValue; 
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax("OCIO_SR_HelperUtils");
	ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "getDateComparison");
	ga.addParam("sysparm_date_to_check", effective_date);
	ga.getXML(cbIsPast);
	
	function cbIsPast(response) {          
				
		var isInPast = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		// Hide existing msg first to avoid to display more than once per control
		g_form.hideFieldMsg('u_effective_date', true);
		
		var msg = 'Date must not be in the past. ' + effective_date;
		if(isInPast == "true"){
			
			g_form.setValue('u_effective_date','');
			
			g_form.showFieldMsg('u_effective_date', msg, "error", false); 
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MUNGIM</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-29 20:49:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2d342c68db9023007a74fe1b689619a2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Effective Date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2d342c68db9023007a74fe1b689619a2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-20 00:24:34</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_page"><sp_page action="DELETE"><category>custom</category><css/><draft>false</draft><dynamic_title_structure/><id>sm_view</id><internal>false</internal><public>false</public><roles>itil,bcgov_sr_service_manager</roles><short_description/><sys_class_name>sp_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-03 04:09:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>05860f334f2b1300c8030fbf9310c73f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sm_view</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_page_05860f334f2b1300c8030fbf9310c73f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mkuriako</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-15 01:27:46</sys_updated_on><title>Service Manager VIew</title></sp_page><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=05860f334f2b1300c8030fbf9310c73f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_df172a34db34ef40fe199236db9619bd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Change Account">d401be25db1f13003d1dd001cf9619a2</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>On Submit Handler</name><order>900</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set the Data Integrity to apply the business rule on Form Sumbit on Catalog Item View
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-650 24-Sep-2018  Munhwan Gim     Set the Data Integration not to collect unnecessay data per IWantTo... 
 *
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project
 **/
function onSubmit() {
	var i_want = g_form.getValue('u_i_want_to');

	switch (i_want) {
		case 'u_change_account_expiry_date':
			g_form.setValue('u_effective_date','', '');
			g_form.setValue('u_comments', '', '');
			break;
		case 'u_remove_account_expiry_date':
			g_form.setValue('u_account_expiry_date', '', '');
			g_form.setValue('u_effective_date', '', '');
			g_form.setValue('u_comments', '', '');
			break;
		case 'u_place_hold':
		case 'u_remove_hold':
			g_form.setValue('u_account_expiry_date', '', '');
			break;
		default:
			break;
	}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MUNGIM_A</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-24 21:34:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>df172a34db34ef40fe199236db9619bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>On Submit Handler</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_df172a34db34ef40fe199236db9619bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM_A</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 21:49:46</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_map_e817468a0a0a0b260050ef1ab53941c6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>true</copy_empty_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>LDAP User Import</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[//
// The manager coming in from LDAP is the DN value for the manager.  
// The line of code below will locate the manager that matches the
// DN value and set it into the target record. To ignore the manager 
// from LDAP, remove or comment out the line: ldapUtils.setManager(source, target);
//
// NOTE: The 'manager' field SHOULD NOT be mapped in the 'Field Maps' related list
// if the manager is brought in through an LDAP import.  The 'ldapUtils' scripts
// here and in the 'onComplete' Transform Map will map this value automatically.
ldapUtils.setManager(source, target);

// Set the source LDAP server into the target record
target.ldap_server = source.sys_import_set.data_source.ldap_target.server;]]></script><source_table>ldap_import</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2008-05-14 15:41:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>e817468a0a0a0b260050ef1ab53941c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LDAP User Import</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LDAP Support" source="com.glide.ldap">d3ea6cb7db710300ae0690f9db9619eb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_e817468a0a0a0b260050ef1ab53941c6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-02 00:31:28</sys_updated_on><target_table>sys_user</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_70e26c28db9023007a74fe1b6896193e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Change Account">d401be25db1f13003d1dd001cf9619a2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e001f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf96193b</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Account Expiry Date</name><order>300</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Expiry Date not to set in Past
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB### 11-July-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation 
 * SB-## 25-July-2018  Munhwan Gim      Fix the defect to show the validate msg more than once
 * SB-649 25-July-2018  Munhwan Gim     Fix defect
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == oldValue) {
		return;
	}

	var expiry_date = newValue;
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax("OCIO_SR_HelperUtils");
	ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "getDateComparison");
	ga.addParam("sysparm_date_to_check", expiry_date);
	ga.getXML(cbIsPast);
	
	function cbIsPast(response) {          
				
		var isInPast = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		// Hide existing msg first to avoid to display more than once per control
		g_form.hideFieldMsg("u_account_expiry_date", true);
		
		var msg = 'Date must not be in the past. ' + expiry_date;
		if(isInPast == "true"){
			g_form.setValue('u_account_expiry_date','');
			
			g_form.showFieldMsg('u_account_expiry_date', msg, "error", false); 
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MUNGIM</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-29 20:43:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>70e26c28db9023007a74fe1b6896193e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Account Expiry Date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_70e26c28db9023007a74fe1b6896193e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-20 00:26:12</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_7001f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961976
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Change Account">d401be25db1f13003d1dd001cf9619a2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7401f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961946</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default from Requested For</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	//Get value from script include
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid',  newValue);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);	
	function cbFtn(answer) {		
		if (answer) {
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			//Set short description of task
			var sc_item_request_display_name = 'Change Account for '+ retObj.username;
			g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);
			//Set Requested for organization
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-14 16:33:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7001f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961976</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default from Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7001f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961976</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM_A</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 21:10:52</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_4e7085bcdb68a740fe199236db961971
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Change Account">d401be25db1f13003d1dd001cf9619a2</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Make Effective Date Empty</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
	var i_want = g_form.getValue('u_i_want_to');

	if(i_want != 'u_place_hold' && i_want != 'u_remove_hold'){
		g_form.setValue('u_effective_date', '');
	} else {
		g_form.setValue('u_comments', '', '');
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-12 03:47:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4e7085bcdb68a740fe199236db961971</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make Effective Date Empty</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4e7085bcdb68a740fe199236db961971</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM_A</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 21:34:42</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
